title: Cha Seo Won, Jo Joon Young, Lee Jae In join 'Spring Fever' cast - 조선일보

) How to measure it next sprint: "Audit internal link clusters with tools like Ahrefs or Screaming Frog, tracking rank improvements for linked pages and user engagement signals (e.g., bounce rate, session duration).

title: Kraft Heinz to Separate 10 Years After Megamerger
author: Adweek Marketing
essence: Kraft Heinz to Separate 10 Years After Megamerger What changed: Kraft Heinz will split into two public companies by mid-2024, separating its North American grocery business (e.g., Kraft, Heinz, Oscar Mayer) from its international and snacks division (e.g., Planters, Capri Sun). The split follows a decade of stagnation post-merger, with revenue flat at ~$26B in 2023 and shareholder pressure for growth. Who should care: Investors, retailers, and CPG competitors (e.g., Nestlé, PepsiCo) will watch for operational efficiency gains or further consolidation.
reactions: ) KPI impact: The separation could improve agility by allowing each entity to focus on distinct KPIs (e.g., Heinz on premiumization, Kraft on cost efficiency), but short-term revenue volatility may dilute long-term growth metrics.
) Risk/trade-off: Splitting the company mitigates operational inefficiencies but risks losing economies of scale in procurement and distribution, a trade-off seen in past CPG breakups like Kellogg’s.
) How to measure it next sprint: Track shareholder reactions (stock performance) and operational metrics (supply chain cost savings) as leading indicators of separation success.

) How to measure it next sprint: "Audit all plugins for missing sanitization/escaping in user-facing parameters, prioritizing those with high traffic or sensitive data exposure.
